name: ShapeDriller Company
description:
It is a simple reaction arcade game. You only can drill the colored blocks if you have equiped the right tool. For example you need the red drill to successfully harvest a red block. You can speed up or slow down the block movement by pressing W or S (digital cross up and down on Gamepad)... If you do so, your score multiplicator will rise ... With the arrow-Keys or the colored buttons on a xbox controller you can change the drill...

Try the HTML5 version here.
